One/CD of/IN the/DT problems/. I/PRP find/VBP when/WRB eating/VBG Thai/NN food/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP is/VBZ they/PRP way/RB they/PRP have/VBN to/TO modify/VB the/DT dish/NN to/TO suit/VB the/DT local/JJ palate/NN ./.
